column4: guys is there a possibility of having a boot floppy disk and then have that thing turn over the boot process to the cd drive?
the bios wont let me boot from cd for some reason
its pretty old thats probably why
you set up the boot order in bios?
it wont let me do that
so it doesnt havet that option
hmm... there may be a way to make a boot floppy. i'll google for it
If I could just load grub on there
yes thats it thank you so much
